index.title: Healthcare Robot
index.subtitle: AI-powered healthcare assistance for clinical and public use. Learn More
index.footer_note: Bridging gaps in healthcare with affordable, intelligent robotic assistance

problem.title: Problem Statements
problem.subtitle: Key challenges in healthcare today. Learn More

items.title: Real-Time Monitoring Gap
items.description: Hospitals lack continuous vitals tracking. Manual checks cause delays and inconsistency.

items.title: High Cost Barrier
items.description: Existing robots cost several lakhs, unaffordable for smaller clinics and public institutions.

items.title: No Integrated Solution
items.description: Missing device that combines vitals monitoring with AI chatbot for health screening.

items.title: Staff Overload
items.description: Nurses overwhelmed with repetitive tasks, reducing time for critical care.

items.title: Limited Public Access
items.description: Airports, malls, schools lack accessible health screening tools for emergencies.

items.title: Infection Risk
items.description: Manual screening requires close contact, increasing infection spread risk.

items.title: No Instant Data Logging
items.description: Traditional systems lack instant alerts and early warning detection capabilities.

problem.footer_note: Addressing critical gaps in healthcare delivery and accessibility

solution.title: OUR SOLUTION
solution.subtitle: AI-Enabled Medical Assistance Robot
solution.description: We provide an affordable, modular, and intelligent medical robot that combines real-time health monitoring, AI conversation, and automated patient assistance in one system.

items.title: Real-Time Vitals Monitoring
items.description: Continuously measures temperature, heart rate, SpO‚ÇÇ, weight, and other vitals using integrated sensors, reducing manual workload.

items.title: AI Medical Chatbot
items.description: The robot can talk to patients, answer basic medical queries, provide health guidance, and collect symptoms through conversation.

items.title: Automated Patient Records
items.description: All vitals and interactions are stored instantly in a digital dashboard for doctors and nurses to access.

items.title: Face Recognition
items.description: Helps track patient history, reduces confusion, and supports smooth hospital workflow.

items.title: Modular Hardware Design
items.description: Low-cost sensors, camera modules, and microcontrollers make the robot affordable and easy to maintain or upgrade.

items.title: Mobile Guidance & Assistance
items.description: The robot can guide patients, help them check in, provide directions, or answer common questions‚Äîreducing staff workload.

items.title: Secure Data Processing
items.description: Integrated authentication, encrypted storage, and access control protect patient data.

items.title: Scalable Beyond Hospitals
items.description: Deployable in schools, colleges, offices, malls, airports, hostels, and elderly care centers for health screening and information services.

solution.footer_note: One integrated platform for comprehensive healthcare assistance

methodology.title: METHODOLOGY
methodology.subtitle: Multi-layered approach combining sensing, processing, AI intelligence, interaction, and data security.
methodology.footer_note: Integrated multi-layered system for comprehensive healthcare assistance
